== About Me ==
<nowiki>[[File:wulf_left.png||align="left"]]</nowiki>
Hello, my name is Rafael Laguna (Redwolf). I'm from <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London|London]]</nowiki>, settled in <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valencia|Valencia]]</nowiki>. == Graphical contribution ==

Obviously a designer's career and contribution list may not be as huge as a coder's one, our kind of interventions may be too specific. That's why I intended to take myself out from the computer and spreading Ubuntu all over educational centers, trying to educate future Ubuntu users about the benefits of this system, as well of other free software packages (LibreOffice, KDEnLive, The GIMP, etc).

=== Artwork ===

<nowiki>[[File:banner_ui.png]]</nowiki><<BR>>

This evolves designing the whole artwork package for the <nowiki>[[http://lubuntu.me/|Lubuntu]]</nowiki> distro

** !LxDesign
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Lucid/LxDesign|LxDesign]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 10.04 (finished Feb. 13, 2010). OS splash, wallpapers, UI elements, etc.
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Maverick/LxDesign|LxDesign2]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 10.10 (finished July 5, 2010). OS splash, wallpapers, UI elements, GTK & Openbox themes, etc. 
** O³ (ozone)
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Natty/Ozone|O³ (ozone I)]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 11.04 (finished March 6, 2011). Artwork for OS splash, wallpapers, UI elements, GTK & Openbox themes, icons, etc.
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Oneiric/Ozone|O³ (ozone II)]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 11.10 (finished December 19, 2011). OS splash, wallpapers, UI elements, GTK & Openbox themes, icons, etc.
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Precise/Ozone|O³ (ozone III)]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 12.04 (finished March 7, 2012). Artwork for OS splash, wallpapers, UI elements, GTK & Openbox themes, icons, etc.
** Box
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Quantal/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 12.10 (finished August 8, 2012). Including the usual, plus an awesome brand new icon theme! :)
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Raring/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 13.04 (finished February 21, 2013). You know, icons, controls and stuff.
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Saucy/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 13.10 (finished October 24, 2013).
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Trusty/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 14.04 (finished February 15, 2014).
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Utopic/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 14.10 (finished September 09, 2014).
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Vivid/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 15.04 (finished September 09, 2014).
*** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork/Incoming/Wily/Box|Box]]</nowiki> for Lubuntu 15.10 (finished August 13, 2015).
** ...and <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/Artwork#Released_artwork|more]]</nowiki>

== Future plans ==

I'd like to continue my work in this operating system and its derivatives, co-working with the great people I've already know and those who are newcomers. We need every mind. I'm happy to collaborate with the brand new project LXQT and its implementation on Lubuntu systems. 

== Testimonials ==
I am amazed that I am first to leave a testimonial here. Rafael makes Lubuntu look beautiful. I wish I could say more about his work for Ubuntu Adverts here too, as those creative teams are near ready for graphics work. Keep up the good work! -- <nowiki>[[UndiFineD]]</nowiki> 2011-04-05

Rafael done (and continues to do) an amazing work for Lubuntu, providing the artwork for 3 releases. It's include background, images, windows theme, and slideshow for the installer. I'm very happy to work with him, he is always enthusiastic, and answer questions and feedbacks very quickly and always in a positive way.
Artwork is an important work for a distribution. It's the visual identity, and the look & feel is important for the users. Rafael deserves equal thanks than people who do patches, packages, documentation, support and help. -- <nowiki>[[gilir]]</nowiki> 2011-06-24

It does beggar belief that such a talented and dedicated guy needs a testimonial. But, here goes :) Rafael is not only the 'chief of staff' for the Lubuntu themes, he also is more than willing to help out on other projects. It is one of those "Why, on earth, is he not already a full member" moments that was recently rectified via the main forum. Rafael breeths the graphics into Lubuntu, without him life would have been more difficult. I do ask the council to consider that not every contributer to *buntu can have a 'score' in points. Please look upon his application favourably. <nowiki>[[phillw]]</nowiki> 2011-09-03

I haven't worked with Rafael very much, but I have helped him out with small tasks. Rafael's a great guy and the amount of quality work Rafael has put in Lubuntu is incredible. He has taken the distribution to a whole 'nother level with his artwork and design, and to be honest Lubuntu wouldn't be where it is today if it wasn't for him. I really hope to work with Rafael more in the future, whether it's a small task or a larger project. <nowiki>[[frankbooth]]</nowiki> 2011-09-03

I wholeheartedly support Rafael's application to be a Ubuntu Member. He has shown sustained and significant contributions to help keep Lubuntu looking great. His graphical work with Lubuntu is always of a very high quality. He is very approachable and assists others on the mailing list. -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:jarednorris]]</nowiki>
